chart.name: chart.daily.planned.charge.in.month.per.project
chart.title: Daily planned charge in a month per project
chart.dataset: select sum(e.hourlyRate*t.plannedHours) as charge, p.name as project FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectPlanningTime t ON t.project = p.id INNER JOIN Employee e ON t.employee = e.id WHERE MONTH(t.date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY p.id

chart.name: chart.daily.planned.charge.in.month.per.employee
chart.title: Daily planned charge in a month per employee
chart.dataset: select sum(e.hourlyRate*t.plannedHours) as charge, p.name as project , e.name as employee FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectPlanningTime t ON t.project = p.id INNER JOIN Employee e ON t.employee = e.id WHERE MONTH(t.date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY p.id,e.id

chart.name: chart.average.daily.planned.charge.in.month.per.employee
chart.title: Daily planned charge in a month in an average per employee
chart.dataset: select avg(e.hourlyRate*t.plannedHours) as charge , e.name as employee FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectPlanningTime t ON t.project = p.id INNER JOIN Employee e ON t.employee = e.id WHERE MONTH(t.date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY e.id
